title: Refresh Access Token
name: AccessToken_Refresh
description:
Request a new access token using a refresh token.

The refresh token is passed via request header Authorization using the following format:

Authorization: Bearer

A new refresh token will be generated and returned along with the new access token. An access token is valid for 24 hours, after which it must be refreshed using a refresh token. The old access token and refresh token will no longer be usable.

This API has the same response structure as API Request Access Token.

Device-Identifier: aaaa-bbbb-cccc-dddd
Device-Model: Google Chrome
Device-Platform: web
User-Agent: Google Chrome/12.1.14

title: Request Access Token
name: AccessToken_Request
description:
Request access token using the provided credentials.

The credential is passed via request header Authorization using the following format:

Authorization:

The following authorization types are supported:

type credentials
Basic base64(email:password)

The user session starts from the time the access token is generated. An access token is valid for 24 hours, after which it must be refreshed using a refresh token.

Note

Each user can only have 1 active session per device (defined by header Device-Identifier).

title: Channel - WhatsApp BA - Create Channel & Subscription
name: Channel_WhatsAppBA_CreateSubscription
description:
Create a new channel for WhatsApp Business API on behalf of a customer organization and create subscription for the billing.

Supported vendors: "meta", "kataai", "wappin-v2".

If param createSubscription is true, the params skuID, skuString, currency, and unitPrice must match any of the available SKU items.

The param unitPrice will be used if overrideUnitPrice is true. Otherwise, it must match the selected SKU item's price.

Parameter.description: The topic ID for chats sent to this channel. Required if the organization has more than 1 topic.
If should show FAQ in the channel.
If should create subscription for the channel.
The subscription's details, required if should create subscription.
If should override the SKU's unit price.
If the WhatsApp Business Account was created via Embedded Signup.
The FB App's details connected to the WhatsApp Business API, if not using Embedded Signup.
If included, enables local storage on the business phone number. Value must be a 2-letter ISO 3166 country code (e.g. "ID") indicating the country where you want data-at-rest to be stored.
The System User access token or Business Integration System User access token.
If should ignore FB App ID returned by debug token.
If the instance is using WABA Cloud.

examples.title: Request Example (not paid):
examples.content:
{
  "organizationID": 1,
  "accountName": "TapTalk",
  "topicID": 0,
  "showFAQ": false,
  "channelStatus": "not_paid",
  "vendor": "",
  "messageTemplateNamespace": "",
  "tierID": 2,
  "createSubscription": true,
  "subscription": {
    "skuID": 37,
    "skuString": "wb-mau-3k.c12.m1.1",
    "currency": "IDR",
    "unitPrice": 5100000,
    "unitDiscountAmount": 0,
    "overrideUnitPrice": false
  }
}

title: Channel - WhatsApp BA - Create Channel & Subscription
name: Channel_WhatsAppBA_CreateSubscription
description:
Create a new channel for WhatsApp Business API on behalf of a customer organization and create subscription for the billing.

If param createSubscription is true, the params skuID, skuString, currency, and unitPrice must match any of the available SKU items.

The param unitPrice will be used if overrideUnitPrice is true. Otherwise, it must match the selected SKU item's price.

Parameter.description: The topic ID for chats sent to this channel.
If should show FAQ in the channel.
The WhatsApp Business API's message template namespace.
If should create subscription for the channel.
The SKU ID, required if should create subscription.
The SKU string/code, required if should create subscription.
The currency, required if should create subscription.
The unit price, required if should create subscription.
If should override the SKU's unit price, required if should create subscription.

examples.title: Request Example:
examples.content:
{
  "organizationID": 1,
  "accountName": "Customer Order",
  "phone": "",
  "topicID": 1,
  "showFAQ": false,
  "vendor": "wappin",
  "instanceUsername": "taptalk.io",
  "instancePassword": "abc123",
  "instanceURL": "",
  "instanceTemplateNamespace": "",
  "tierID": 2,
  "createSubscription": true,
  "skuID": 37,
  "skuString": "wb-mau-3k.c12.m1.1",
  "currency": "IDR",
  "unitPrice": 5100000,
  "overrideUnitPrice": false
}
